content.question: Directions: Listen to the selection, then select from among the answer choices the reply that would most probably be made to the remark or question.

choices.label: Mais non, c’est juste à côté.
Non, elle n’aime pas se baigner.

content.answer: Mais non, c’est juste à côté.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
